sections.title: Function

requirement_evaluations.applicability_reasoning: The section discusses protein function, which aligns with the requirement to focus on cited studies concerning structure and function.

requirement_evaluations.overlap_notes: Functional details may overlap with other sections detailing specific interactions or significance.
